```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

update_header <- function(header = NULL){
	txt <- '
layout: true

<div class="my-header">
<span>BIOF339: Practical R</span></div>
'
	if(!is.null(header)){
		txt <- paste(txt, header, sep = '\n')
	}
return(cat(txt))
}

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results = 'asis'}
update_header('## My choice')
```
